Package manito.eft.interfaces

Class EPSTender

  • java.lang.Object
    • manito.eft.interfaces.EPSTender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable
    public class EPSTender
extends Object
implements Cloneable, Serializable
    Entity class for holding details of an individual tender.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
